programme.desc: Business cards plus DNA technology reveal the killer of a New York woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Bill Kurtis narrates this look at the last 48 hours before the scheduled execution of Michael Johnson, convicted in the senseless killing of Jeff Wetterman 11 years earlier.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Examining college students' work on cases of jailed murderers claiming innocence.

programme.desc: Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 year ago, we reevaluate the case.
